basic_information.scholarship_name: Fallen Angels Endowed Scholarship in Nursing

description: To provide scholarships for Nursing students in the College of Mathematics and Science. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Student must be majoring in Nursing with an interest in trauma Student must be a senior the year of the award Minimum 3.0 GPA Two letters of recommendation from faculty members

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
